snippet: The bride writes marketing copy in Columbus, Ohio, for Lane Bryant; the bridegroom is the vice president for fund-raising operations at the Columbus Jewish Federation.
lead_paragraph: Amelia Marie Kuehn, a daughter of Lisa A. Tedesco and David W. Kuehn of Atlanta, was married Saturday to Matthew David Youngner, a son of Marilyn G. Youngner and Dr. Stuart J. Youngner, both of Shaker Heights, Ohio. The Rev. Dr. Barbara A. B. Patterson, an Episcopal priest, officiated at the Commerce Club in Atlanta. Mrs. Youngner, 27, is known as Mimi. She writes marketing copy for Lane Bryant, the women's clothing division of the Charming Shoppes. She works in Columbus, Ohio. She graduated from the University of Michigan.
